      • setDashboardUrl

        public static void setDashboardUrl(String dashboardUrl)
                            throws MalformedURLException
        Change the Dashboard URL to the given url. This method must be called only before login in.
        Parameters:
        dashboardUrl - the Dashboard URL
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if url is not valid

      • setDefaultDashboardUrl

        public static void setDefaultDashboardUrl()

      • login

        public static void login(android.content.Context context,
                         String user,
                         String password,
                         SitumLoginResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Authenticate an user with password to obtain a SitumDataManager
        Parameters:
        context - The context
        user - The user email (example@situm.es)
        password - The user password
        responseHandler - SitumLoginResponseHandler

      • login

        public static SitumDataManager login(android.content.Context context,
                                     String user,
                                     String apikey)
        Authenticate
        Parameters:
        context - The context
        user - The email (example@situm.es)
        apikey - The secret API key (LSWWczaSvjqgz+L0rDiRZbdr6/SsCskB)
        Returns:
        SitumDataManager never null.

        Parameters:

      • logout

        public static void logout()

      • setAllowInvalidSSL

        public static void setAllowInvalidSSL(boolean allowed)
        Allow self-signed SSL certificates or not.

        It is advisable only to make a single call to this method, since making several calls with different parameters can cause unexpected behavior (only in case of using self-signed SSL certificates)

        Parameters:
        allowed - True if self-signed SSL certificate is allowed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        SSLPeerUnverifiedException
